name: State Domestic Violence and Sexual Assault Coalitions
objective: To coordinate State victim services activities and collaborate and coordinate with Federal, State, and local entities engaged in violence against women activities.
applicant_types: Private nonprofit institution/organization (includes institutions of higher education and hospitals)
categories: Law, Justice, and Legal Services - Law Enforcement Support
rules_regulations: Program notices of funding opportunities (NOFOs) can be found at https://www.justice.gov/ovw/open-notices-of-funding-opportunities. Recipients must comply with the current version of the DOJ Financial Grants Management Guide found at https://www.justice.gov/ovw/grant-management.

pons.pon: Improve Interagency Coordination and Information Sharing
